mapper.insert: insert into sys_login (account, username, time, ip, mobile, inner_ip) VALUES (#{login.account}, #{login.username}, #{login.time}, #{login.ip}, #{login.mobile}, #{login.innerIp})
mapper.select: select * from sys_login sl where sl.username = #{username} order by time desc limit 1
select * from sys_login where account = #{account} order by time desc limit 4
select * from sys_login where account = #{account} order by time desc limit 1
